title: Deathgasm
review: This is like Shaun of the Dead meets Tenacious D. I found it very funny and I appreciated that it wasn't too long. It's about New Zealand teenagers who are fans of hivy mital and accidentally play the secret chord that summons divils. If I was 16 when this was made I'd probably have totally loved it.
spoilers: "Heavy metal up your butthole" made me laugh.
